trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating?displayProperty=nameWithType> event lets you cancel changes to the current cell when the new value is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件可让您的新值不是有效时取消对当前单元格的更改。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A> property to determine the current value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A>属性来确定的当前值。

trans-unit.source: To determine the state of the current cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> properties to access the cell through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定当前的单元格的状态，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>属性访问通过的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the change, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更改，将设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此事件已取消在数据绑定模式下，新值不是推送到基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，取消此事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed?displayProperty=nameWithType>不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件，以确保仅正整数来表示所输入的用户。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>参考主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取需要验证的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based integer that specifies the column index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的整数，它指定需要验证的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Validate Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中验证数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted contents of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取需要验证的单元格的已设置格式的内容。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the formatted value.
trans-unit.target: 已设置格式的值的引用。

trans-unit.source: The text entered by the user through the user interface (UI) becomes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 通过用户界面 (UI) 用户输入的文本将变为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: This is the value that you can validate before it is parsed into the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 这是你可以验证的值的单元格中分析之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件，以确保仅正整数来表示所输入的用户。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>参考主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取需要验证的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based integer that specifies the row index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的整数，它指定需要验证的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Validate Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中验证数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。
